# Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Auto-generated files
*.cache
*.ilk
*.meta
*.obj
*.iobj
*.pch
*.pdb
*.ipdb
*.pgc
*.pgd
*.rsp
*.sbr
*.tlb
*.tli
*.tlh
*.tmp
*.tmp_proj
*.log
*.vspscc
*_i.c
*_p.c
*.dll
*.exe
*.idb
*.class
*.lib

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
out/

# Visual Studio folders
.vs/

# Rider IDE
.idea/

# NPM / Node modules (if any frontend inside)
node_modules/
dist/
build/

# Backup & config files
*.bak
*.backup
*.swp
*.DS_Store
